author: Melissa Holzberg
title: Biden holds lead in latest general election polls
description: Former Vice President Joe Biden has maintained his lead against President Trump in the latest general election polls.
content:
Biden holds lead in latest general election polls
Apparent Democratic presidential nominee Joe Biden is hanging onto his lead in two general election polls against President Trump this week. In the latest Quinnipiac University poll, released Wednesday, and M… [+29605 chars]
